text: Had moments feeling like "an adult" yet everyday life suggests otherwise.
Engineers fix everything... except social awkwardness!
Pens more mightier than wrenches; design overshadows hands-on these days.
In every tech team meeting there's sometimes an old-school head who mistakes assertiveness for aggression if not coming from a guy—time for another update!
Sure old habits die hard – but even in engineering there’s slow shift seen.
Age milestones like 30 often bring unwarranted stress over 'having your act together'. But steel frames take time—and let’s face it—life isn’t factory-issued.
Interesting perspective! Seen both sides - some places exactly echo hometown vibes while others toss those expectations right out the window!
Bavarian beer tents? Unexpected elegance abroad!
The surprise was real when finding out not every city has an efficient public transit system - took some adjusting after relying heavily on it back home!
